name: Cipitz
desc: A boy from the Collective of Plenty who wants to be the strongest luchador in the tribe.

customize.text: Adventure Challenge: The Future's Fiercest Fight

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
To claim the title of "the strongest wrestler," one must defeat countless formidable foes and stand proudly at the summit of victory. The Genius Invokation TCG lineup you face is made up of none other than a collection of formidable foes Cipitz plucked from the stories of his elders.
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames
customize.desc:
Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames

From chapters of canon revealed comes much heeded admonishments.

customize.name: Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning
customize.desc:
Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning

Praise be unto the Abyss, the Wisdom of Corrosion.

customize.name: Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents
customize.desc:
Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents

The world shall be severed, and all shall be obliterated.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
